author: Brodie Robertson
description:
I was recently made aware of the Wii Homebrew Channel license drama and there's a real problem but the way it was handled was so insanely dumb, what could have just been a simple email ended up being a community who thinks everything is in flames.

==========Support The Channel==========

► Liberapay: https://brodierobertson.xyz/liberapay

title: Homebrew Channel License Drama Is Dumb
